ygData.subject: Re: Fire Fingers
ygData.msgSnippet: ROFL, you know I have never figured this one you myself, its hard to get off a spell with just ONE mob hitting you, so they give you a spell incase you have
ygData.messageBody:
ROFL, you know I have never figured this one you myself, its hard to get off
a spell with just ONE mob hitting you, so they give you a spell incase you
have several mob's pounding on you. I do not see how you could ever get it
off. hehe maybe it's so the wizard can run into the center of the battle
and zap all the mob's at once , and save the tanks, LOL,

Edywen
Xegony

----- Original Message -----
From: Jay Hollums <jhollums@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 1:17 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Fire Fingers


> From: "Jay Hollums" <jhollums@...>
>
> What good is this spell... I have never seen the damage on it so on that I
> cannot comment. However, if wizards are never suppose to tank... what
good
> is a PB area effect spell? It is tough enough having every monster in an
> area attack you when you area effect spell them at range... much less at
PB.
> Will some one give me some insight into this spell and others like it (PB
> area damage)?
>
> Rutreeii
